mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_ID, NAME, en_name, CAR_PARTS_ID, CAR_PARTS_PRODUCER_ID, DEFAULT_PIC_SRC, PRICE, yuanjia, BN, PRODUCT_AREA, UNIT, STORE, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, MARKETABLE, USER_ID, IS_CAR_PRODUCTER, IS_MEMBER_DISCOUNT, P_ORDER, DISABLED, PRODUCT_BN, IN_CITY, IN_PROVINCE, OUT_PROVINCE, QUERY_NUM, CLICK_NUMBER, IS_MAIL, IS_STANDER, SEND_IP, SH_CAT_ID, lessinformation, goodstype, is_mailing, sku_id, yiji, erji, sanji, yijinum, erjinum, sanjinum, wuliu, fanxian, fanxiannum, freePostageNum, isConsultingPostage, is_point, point_percentage, sell_country_id, is_building, is_market, is_shop, is_group, is_flash_sale, activity_price, praise_rate, praise_num, order_end_num, click_num, zonghe, is_index_shop, is_index_market, is_index_build, sys_update_date,INFOMATION, UNIN_GOODS,activity_people_num

a.ID as id ,a.NAME as name, a.en_name as enName,a.company_id as companyId, a.CAR_PARTS_ID as carPartsId , a.CAR_PARTS_PRODUCER_ID as carPartsProducerId, a.DEFAULT_PIC_SRC as defaultPicSrc, a.price as price, a.yuanjia as yuanjia, a.BN as bn, a.PRODUCT_AREA as productArea, a.UNIT as unit, a.STORE as store, a.CREATETIME, a.MODIFYTIME, a.MARKETABLE, a.USER_ID, a.IS_CAR_PRODUCTER, a.IS_MEMBER_DISCOUNT, a.P_ORDER, a.DISABLED, a.PRODUCT_BN, a.IN_CITY, a.QUERY_NUM as queryNum, a.CLICK_NUMBER as clickNumber, a.goodstype, a.is_mailing as isMailing, a.sku_id as skuId, a.yiji, a.erji, a.sanji, a.yijinum, a.erjinum,a.sanjinum, a.wuliu, a.fanxian, a.fanxiannum, a.freePostageNum, a.isConsultingPostage, a.is_point as isPoint, a.is_building isBuilding, a.is_market as isMarket, a.is_shop as isShop, a.is_group as isGroup, a.is_flash_sale as isFlashSale, a.activity_price AS activityPrice, a.praise_rate AS praiseRate, a.praise_num AS praiseNum, a.order_end_num as orderEndNum, a.click_num AS clickNum,a.zonghe, a.is_index_shop AS isIndexShop, a.is_index_market AS isIndexMarket, a.is_index_build AS isIndexBuild, a.sys_update_date AS sysUpdateDate,a.INFOMATION as infomation, cp.COMPANY_NAME as companyName,com.sale_rate as saleRate,b.value as docRate,d.value as dlmRate,cp.address as comAddress,cp.COMPANY_PURPOSE as companyPurpose, if(a.is_flash_sale = '1' or a.is_group = '1',a.price * a.activity_price * b.VALUE * com.sale_rate,a.price * b.VALUE * com.sale_rate) AS docPrice, if(a.is_flash_sale = '1' or a.is_group = '1',a.price * a.activity_price * d.VALUE * com.sale_rate,a.price * d.VALUE * com.sale_rate) AS dlmPrice, if(cp.id='123','1','0') as isSysSelf, if(a.is_flash_sale = '1','1',if(a.is_group = '1','2',if(a.is_shop = '1','3',if(a.is_market = '1','4','5')))) as cornerMark, a.activity_people_num as activityPeopleNum
mapper.select: select FROM ql_goods WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,2

update ql_goods
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_PARTS_ID = #{carPartsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_PARTS_PRODUCER_ID = #{carPartsProducerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_PIC_SRC = #{defaultPicSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

PRODUCT_AREA = #{productArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE = #{store,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MARKETABLE = #{marketable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CAR_PRODUCTER = #{isCarProducter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MEMBER_DISCOUNT = #{isMemberDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
P_ORDER = #{pOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_BN = #{productBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_CITY = #{inCity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_PROVINCE = #{inProvince,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OUT_PROVINCE = #{outProvince,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUERY_NUM = #{queryNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLICK_NUMBER = #{clickNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_MAIL = #{isMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_STANDER = #{isStander,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEND_IP = #{sendIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SH_CAT_ID = #{shCatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lessinformation = #{lessinformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodstype = #{goodstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_mailing = #{isMailing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yiji = #{yiji,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
erji = #{erji,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sanji = #{sanji,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
yijinum = #{yijinum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
erjinum = #{erjinum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

wuliu = #{wuliu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fanxian = #{fanxian,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fanxiannum = #{fanxiannum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
freePostageNum = #{freepostagenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isConsultingPostage = #{isconsultingpostage,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_point = #{isPoint,jdbcType=BIT},
point_percentage = #{pointPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sell_country_id = #{sellCountryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_building = #{isBuilding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_market = #{isMarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_shop = #{isShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_group = #{isGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_flash_sale = #{isFlashSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_price = #{activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
praise_rate = #{praiseRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_end_num = #{orderEndNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
click_num = #{clickNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
zonghe = #{zonghe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_index_shop = #{isIndexShop,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_index_market = #{isIndexMarket,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_index_build = #{isIndexBuild,jdbcType=CHAR},
sys_update_date = #{sysUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INFOMATION = #{infomation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
UNIN_GOODS = #{uninGoods,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
